title: Ping Spikes
body: This only started happening recently after the latest patch. I never had any issues, my ping is always at 30 or so, then jumps up to 500 for a few seconds and goes back down. I tried the hextech tool, I tried a full reinstall, I can't think of anything else. I can play a bunch of other multiplayer games that I have and have absolutely no connection issues on those. I have verizon fios, if that means anything

replies.body:
I have had other players report latency issues on Verizon FiOS as well. While we may ultimately need to look at your network route to figure out where this issue is originating, there are some steps to be taken first. I'd like you to briefly work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your latency issues aren't caused by any incompatible network settings on your local end.

Let me know if you continue to experience these latency issues after taking those steps.
I got ping spikes as well, normal ping 17, since latest patch I have 17 - 50 and spikes every 4 / 5 seconds up to 600 ping.
Digicel ISP fiber connection here, usual ping 86, ping spikes on random games
I'm having the same issue and I have optimum. I use a Mac and didn't have this issue ever since the latest patch. So you're not alone. Hopefully Riot investigates what's wrong.
